rooms.description: Welcoming space with open layout and natural light. Vastu principles ensure entry on the auspicious east direction.
Spacious living area with Bohemian decor elements, large windows for cross ventilation and natural light. Vastu suggests placement in the north-east corner.
Cozy dining space adjoining the living room. Open to courtyard through sliding glass doors for enhanced ventilation.
Modern kitchen design with traditional touches. Placed in the southeast area as per Vastu guidelines ensuring auspicious energy flow.
Private master bedroom with ensuite bathroom. Aligned towards the south for a peaceful and restful ambiance.
Secondary bedroom with natural light coming from east side windows.
Compact guest room positioned in the north area aligning with positive energy flow.
Attached to master bedroom ensuring privacy and convenience.
Dedicated living space for domestic help. Placed towards the rear of the plot to maintain privacy.
Open communal courtyard serving as a natural light and ventilation hub. Features water element for Vastu balance.

openings.description: Primary entry point designed to welcome positive energy as per Vastu.
Large windows for cross ventilation and natural lighting; strategically placed in accordance with Vastu principles.
Facilitates seamless indoor-outdoor flow and enhances ventilation.
Connects interior living space with the swimming pool area while ensuring privacy.
